Room.Name: Avalanch
Room.ShortDescription: You are several meters above the Nyyron trail, on the crest of an avalanch.
Room.LongDescription: above you is a gulley where the avalanch debris came from. It looks like you could climb up there, if you have climbing gear with you. Often gold is discovered after a fresh avalanch, and this one only occurred since the last winter. Below you is the Nyyron Creek, where you see a small waterfall has formed because of the newly deposited earth in the creek's path.
